item.description:
9:00 PM - While we dine in Bella Luna, we can converse in Portuguese.

Bella Luna website

10:00 PM - We'll move into the Milky Way Lounge, which is inside the same building as Bella Luna. There is an additional $8 cover charge (cash only) for the show.

 

 

 

Here's a picture of the building in which Bella Luna and Milky Way are located.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It's Mardi Gras season, so it seems timely for us to get in the spirit by heading to Milky Way to once again enjoy the lively powerful sound of Bloco AfroBrazil. If you want to get in the mood, try a refreshing Guarana, Caipirinha or Caju Amigo, which are well known Brazilian beverages.

Here's yet another chance for you to experience the baddest, loudest, funnest indoor carnival around. Yes, I am a GIGANTIC fan which is apparent because each time this group parties, I place it on the  Onyxbird travelers and Happy Hour Meetup calendars because it always exceeds expectation. Since dinner is an option, I've also invited the Meetup dining group,Breakfast Brunch Lunch & Dinner. Let's pack the place because the more the merrier and also your presence may help place the Bloco AfroBrazil party on their schedule more often.

Bloco AfroBrazil is a percussion ensemble that always puts on a spectacular show combining traditional Brazilian grooves like Samba and Axé with Funk, Rock, Jazz and even Hip Hop. Wear your dance shoes or socks and leave your worries at the door!!

Bring your friends....I guarantee a funtastic time, that is if you like your music strong and your party loud.

Once the drumming, singing and dancing start, group conversation is difficult. Let's just enjoy the party!

Bloco AfroBrazil website

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

 

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:

 Create your route at MBTA or Hop Stop

Take the Orange Line to Stony Brook Station. As you exit the station, turn left and walk up Boylston Street to the first stoplight. At the light, take a right onto Amory Street. The Brewery Complex is 1/2 mile up on your left. Bella Luna & The Milky Way Lounge is on the first floor, main entrance is on the right hand side of the building next to the smokestack.

PARKING INFORMATION: 
There are 80 complementary parking spaces on the Amory Street side of The Brewery Complex (do not park in the 15 minute spots next to Amory street or you may be towed).
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549
item.why: We always have fun when we're together.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brazilian Party at Milky Way with Bloco AfroBrazil Friday March 11th 9 PM
